welcome desc2: Take photos of monuments and identify them.
welcome desc3: Listen and read the story behind the monuments.
password validation: password must be at least 6 characters
snap tip1: Place the object in the center.
snap tip2: For more accurate recognition, make sure the picture features only one statue.
snap tip3: If the statue is too big, take a photo to all object not a part of it.
GPS off: Please open GPS or choose yourself
no permissions: No Permissions! allow the permissions or choose yourself
too far: You are too far from the places
